mapper.select: select o.id as o_id, o.receiver_name as o_receiver_name, o.receiver_phone as o_receiver_phone, o.receiver_address as o_receiver_address, o.order_status as o_order_status, p.id as p_id, p.name as p_name, p.price as p_price, op.count as op_count, u.name as u_name from `ORDER` as o left outer join order_product op on o.id = op.order_id left outer join product p on op.product_id = p.id left outer join `USER` u on o.user_id = u.id where o.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into `ORDER` (receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_address, user_id) values (#{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{receiverAddress}, #{user.id})
